summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingEstée Lauder's Pure Color Lipstick is a long-wearing, lip-adoring lipstick with striking, plumping color in a dimensional crème finish.
details: DetailsBenefitsLong-lasting lipstick saturates lips with statement-making, wearable color designed to flatter all skintones.High-performance lipstick stays color true & wears for 10 impactful hours while resisting bleeding, feathering and creasingCrème finish: Dimensional color glides on effortlessly to a smooth, satin finishFeaturesFull coverage lipstick with plumping, nourishing & conditioning benefitsExpertly designed lipstick bullet is perfectly shaped to help sculpt the curves of your lips with effortless precisionThe golden case with its magnetic cap is a delight to have & to holdKey IngredientsFeatured Ingredient: Moisture Lock ComplexRich, naturally derived* Moisture Lock Complex features a blend of potent oils plus a powerful plant extract to instantly condition & plump while maintaining moisture on lips over timePotent oil blend: Red Raspberry seed oil, Meadowfoam & Apricot seed oils nourish and condition lipsSalicornea Herbacea Extract: Powerful plant extract maintains lips' moisture and comfort over time.*Per ISO Standard 16128. From plant sources, non-petroleum mineral sources, and/or water.Item 2604692How To UseApply once for an exquisite wash of color or continue to build coverage and amplify the color impact of this long lasting lipstick.Want more shades? Check out Estée Lauder's other Pure Color finishes, too.IngredientsOctyldodecanol, Neopentyl Glycol Diheptanoate, Polyethylene, Silica, Trimethylpentanediol/Adipic Acid/Glycerin Crosspolymer, Nylon-12, Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate, Oleic/Linoleic/Linolenic Polyglycerides, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Polyglyceryl-3 Diisostearate, Tocopherol, Salicornia Herbacea Extract, Polydecene, Stearalkonium Hectorite, Rubus Idaeus (Raspberry) Seed Oil, Limnanthes Alba (Meadowfoam) Seed Oil, Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Kernel Oil, Moringa Oil/Hydrogenated Moringa Oil Esters, Microcrystalline Wax\Cera Microcristallina\Cire Microcristalline, Propylene Carbonate, Lecithin, Saccharin, Fragrance (Parfum), Tocopheryl Acetate, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate. May Contain: Mica, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491), Iron Oxides (CI 77492), Iron Oxides (CI 77499), Bismuth Oxychloride (CI 77163), Blue 1 Lake (CI 42090), Carmine (CI 75470), Manganese Violet (CI 77742), Red 6 (CI 15850), Red 7 (CI 15850), Red 7 Lake (CI 15850), Red 21 (CI 45380), Red 22 (CI 45380), Red 27 (CI 45410), Red 28 Lake (CI 45410), Red 30 Lake (CI 73360), Red 33 Lake (CI 17200), Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140), Yellow 6 Lake (CI 15985).Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply once for an exquisite wash of color or continue to build coverage and amplify the color impact of this long lasting lipstick.Want more shades? Check out Estée Lauder's other Pure Color finishes, too.
ingredients: Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate. May Contain: Mica

reviews.headline: Wonderful!!
reviews.comments: Like everything from Estee Lauder, this lipstick sets and moisturizes at the same time. They're great and the colors are beautiful ❤️

reviews.headline: Love the color of this lipstick!
reviews.comments: I love the color and quality of this lipstick!  It applies easily and after powdering my lips, it stays on for a long time.

reviews.headline: I would definitely buy this product again.
reviews.comments: Long lasting.

reviews.headline: Love this Pink!
reviews.comments: Creamy smooth.  Putting on is effortless

reviews.headline: Great product!
reviews.comments: Just wished it stayed on longer!

reviews.headline: Opposite from long lasting
reviews.comments: I lovr the color but feel like ive been lied to by a close friend. This doesnt last 15 minutes on my lips. Am i applying it wrong?

reviews.headline: My favorite lipstick in my favorite color!
reviews.comments: I just love this creamy lipstick.  It's long lasting, it's so easy to apply; it's a perfect dusty pink color.

reviews.headline: Fabulous quality  & product.
reviews.comments: Super creamy yet long lasting fabulous lipstick.

reviews.headline: Best lipstick ever
reviews.comments: Been a fan of the shade irresistible since 2018 and have not looked back. I use a red liner to line by lips and put this over it and its the best combo. Will be purchasing this for the foreseeable future!

reviews.headline: Love the color had the packaging
reviews.comments: I have bought this lipstock twice since they came out with the new packaging and both times the lipstick breaks while stowed away. There is nothing preventing it from twisting when closed and even putting it in a secure spot in my purse it has twisted to the point where it reaches the end of the tube and when I go to use it, it breaks. It does last most the day and does not dry out my lips but until they change this I wont be purchasing again.

reviews.headline: Lipstick perfectly
reviews.comments: Perfect texture and color. Lasts quite a while, not sticky or flaky.

reviews.headline: Stunning
reviews.comments: Stays on amazing with great color payoff

reviews.headline: Stunning
reviews.comments: Stays on amazing with great color payoff

reviews.headline: Worst lipstick
reviews.comments: This lipstick feels so weird on my lips. It is so thin and almost a little grainy. Also it does not last!! Fades off my lips in 20 minutes. For the price, I thought it would be way better. Don't purchase!

reviews.headline: Is not a longwear lipstick.
reviews.comments: The presentation is cute. The color is pretty. Buttttttt the lipstick does not stay on long. I cannot justify the cost for a short wear lipstick.

reviews.headline: Not worth the price
reviews.comments: Packaging is great as well as the color. I bought the rebellious rose, I love how its so moisturizing. However, it doesnt last very long. I have to keep reapplying throghout the day. For the price, I was expecting for it to last for an hour at least.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again and again
reviews.comments:
After years of searching I have finally found a lipstick with staying power that doesn't dry out my lips!
Bonus is the color is perfection for me
Thank you, thank you!

reviews.headline: Don't think so. Too expensive and no coupon was usable. The
reviews.comments: Creamy, but too expensive .

reviews.headline: Modern Rose is Gorgeous!!
reviews.comments: Luxurious and creamy; stays on throughout drinking and eating; has a pretty bold color/ makes a statement but not bold enough where I can't wear it to work every day.  It's a gorgeous orangey rose color and looks beautiful on.  I can see why it's the number 1 best selling color from Estee Lauder.  For reference I have fair to medium skin tone with neutral undertones.

reviews.headline: Lipstick very creamy and stays on.  Service is great
reviews.comments: Love the store in Dubuque Iowa.  Very helpful young women who know the products well.  Very helpful.

media.headline: Gorgeous Lipstick
media.caption: Gorgeous packaging, I especially love the magnetic pull between the top and the bottom which keeps the lipstick closed and.

faceoff_positive.comments:
I received The Estee Lauder Pure Color Lipstick in the color #520 Carnal complimentary from Influenster and Estee Lauder in exchange for my honest review.
I was excited about the prospect of receiving and trying this red lipstick.It was like a gift for Valentine's Day. A bold,sexy red lip is the perfect color for Valentine's or any day in my humble opinion. The sleek gold case includes the intials EL engraved on the cap.Plus,the cap is magnetic which is a feature that I love.The lipstick itself also has the intials engraved with a lovely design along the sides.When a lipstick is this pretty you hate to mess it up. While unboxing I noticed that it states, "refillable" This is a feature that I have not personally used, but it is a nice option. The lipstick glides on smoothly and offers full coverage on your lips with one application.Due to the creme consistency and moisture complex your lips certainly feel moisturized and cared for. I used a lip primer to try and prevent bleeding, however I still encountered feathering/slight bleeding of the color. I hate to report that I also did not find it to be very long lasting.You will need to reapply throughout the day.The color is more of an orange red and I tend to prefer a more blue toned red. I did not dislike the color,just a personal preference. I will say that it does not feel as dry as other lipsticks.Due to the various oils of the moisture complex it does leave your lips feeling more moisturized than you might expect from a lipstick. If you are looking for a sexy,bold lip full of moisturizing benefits then give this a try. After all,carnal may be your only sexy accessory needed...go ahead and leave your mark!
faceoff_positive.headline: Carnal for Valentine's Day

faceoff_negative.headline: Bring back the old case (Pure Color Envy)
